rows.label: qst701305_msg0001
rows.name: That flower, it's...!

rows.label: qst701305_msg0002
rows.name:
Leon found it for you, but it cost him
his life.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0003
rows.name:
...I'm so sorry we weren't able to
bring him back with us...

rows.label: qst701305_msg0004
rows.name: I... I can't believe it...

rows.label: qst701305_msg0005
rows.name:
I don't know if it'll make it any easier,
but he seemed at peace when we
found him.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0006
rows.name:
At the very least, I don't think he
suffered.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0007
rows.name:
I always knew there was no helping
that guy, but I never did think he'd take
it this far.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0008
rows.name: Leon... You damned fool...

rows.label: qst701305_msg0009
rows.name: You called, oh bosom buddy of mine?

rows.label: qst701305_msg0010
rows.name:
Ah, good, we're right on time.
I happened to pick him up somewhere.
Chatty old fellow, isn't he?

rows.label: qst701305_msg0011
rows.name:
Not to be rude, but I was hoping
you could take him off my hands now.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0012
rows.name:
Oh man, that was a thrilling ride!
I really thought I was dead for sure,
this time!

rows.label: qst701305_msg0013
rows.name:
You... You're...
Then who was...

rows.label: qst701305_msg0014
rows.name:
It looks like we've been taken
for a ride...

rows.label: qst701305_msg0015
rows.name:
Word of warning, bud. I don't much
like practical jokers. Except, I do like
to punch 'em when I can...

rows.label: qst701305_msg0016
rows.name: I don't see how this is possible...

rows.label: qst701305_msg0017
rows.name: I'm just as bemused as the lot of you.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0018
rows.name:
In all my long years, I've never heard
of a human digging their way out of
their own grave...

rows.label: qst701305_msg0019
rows.name:
Wise elder, thank you for the praise!
And also for the help. I'm glad you
came along when you did!

rows.label: qst701305_msg0020
rows.name:
I'm...still not sure what happened,
exactly, but it seems like we're in
your debt again, Nuncle.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0021
rows.name:
Debt? Oh no, think nothing of it.
Now then, I think I've done my part,
so I shall leave you kids to it.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0022
rows.name:
I knew you were an idiot, Leon, but this
really takes the cake...

rows.label: qst701305_msg0023
rows.name:
Wait, wait, I'm not following.
What happened? Did you die,
or didn't you...?

rows.label: qst701305_msg0024
rows.name:
Well, what happened was, I heard you
calling me, as if from a great distance,
with this sadness in your voice....

rows.label: qst701305_msg0025
rows.name:
Hey, Sarah... Deep down inside,
wouldn't you rather be happy?
Wouldn't you rather smile?

rows.label: qst701305_msg0026
rows.name:
I realized while looking for the flower
that the reason I'm so hung up about
you is 'cause I want to really know you!

rows.label: qst701305_msg0028
rows.name:
All right, I give up.
You showed some real courage there,
so I guess I can try giving you an inch.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0029
rows.name: Y-you mean...?!

rows.label: qst701305_msg0030
rows.name: I'll have tea with you sometime, sure.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0031
rows.name:
Sorry, I may have been too quick to
judge you before. So, uh...

rows.label: qst701305_msg0032
rows.name:
"I'll love you forever!", right?!
That's what you were gonna say, right?!

rows.label: qst701305_msg0033
rows.name: Are you deaf, or just an arsehole?!

rows.label: qst701305_msg0034
rows.name:
...God, give me strength...
All I meant to say was "welcome back"!

rows.label: qst701305_msg0035
rows.name: Oh, Sarah!!! My angel!!!

rows.label: qst701305_msg0036
rows.name:
At least everything's finally out
in the open now.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0037
rows.name: So you decided to give him a chance?

rows.label: qst701305_msg0038
rows.name:
I'm still apprehensive, I won't lie.
But I suppose you can't go through life
without taking some chances...

rows.label: qst701305_msg0039
rows.name: Thank you for helping me realize that.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0040
rows.name: Heh. Right back at you.
